menu.title: Buttermilk Pancakes
menu.desc: The taste of fresh milk in our buttermilk pancakes! Start your day with the soft and fluffy texture of our special pancakes.

menu.title: Diner Double Burger
menu.desc: Classic diner-style double burgers with incredible taste and a filling portion—perfect for your lunch!

menu.title: Godzilla Milkshake
menu.desc: A legendary flavor is waiting for you! Treat yourself to our Godzilla Milkshake for a sweet break.

menu.title: Village Breakfast
menu.desc: The irreplaceable taste of country-style breakfasts is here! Our Village Breakfast is prepared with all-natural ingredients and invites you to a feast of flavors.

menu.title: Egg Attack
menu.desc: The irreplaceable taste of country-style breakfasts is here! Our Village Breakfast is prepared with all-natural ingredients and invites you to a feast of flavors.

menu.title: Oreo Dream
menu.desc: A must-try for Oreo lovers! Oreo Dream takes you to a sweet new world. Simply irresistible!

menu.title: Bacon Flood
menu.desc: For bacon lovers! Crispy, freshly fried bacon and other delicious ingredients—Bacon Flood is the best way to start your morning.

menu.title: American Classic
menu.desc: A classic taste from American cuisine, perfect for lunch! Delicious and satisfying at a great price.

menu.title: Quarantine Buddy
menu.desc: A tasty milkshake to keep you company when you're feeling bored—make a sweet escape with Quarantine Buddy.

menu.title: Bison Steak
menu.desc: Unique bison steak paired with special spices and sauces—perfect for your dinner!

menu.title: Avocado Toast Deluxe
menu.desc: Crunchy toast topped with creamy avocado, poached egg, and a sprinkle of chili flakes. The perfect healthy start for your morning.

menu.title: French Omelette
menu.desc: Classic French-style omelette with herbs and melted cheese inside, served with a side of fresh greens.

menu.title: Vegan Pancakes
menu.desc: Fluffy vegan pancakes made with almond milk, topped with berries and a drizzle of maple syrup.

menu.title: Classic Cheeseburger
menu.desc: A juicy beef patty, cheddar cheese, lettuce, tomato, and our secret sauce served in a toasted bun.

menu.title: Crispy Chicken Sandwich
menu.desc: Golden fried chicken breast with pickles, coleslaw, and spicy mayo on a soft brioche bun.

menu.title: BBQ Pulled Pork Burger
menu.desc: Slow-cooked pulled pork with tangy BBQ sauce, pickled onions, and fresh slaw in a toasted burger bun.

menu.title: Veggie Delight Wrap
menu.desc: A healthy wrap loaded with grilled vegetables, hummus, and mixed greens.

menu.title: Triple Chocolate Shake
menu.desc: A rich blend of milk, dark, and white chocolate ice cream for the ultimate chocolate lovers’ experience.

menu.title: Mango Madness Shake
menu.desc: Refreshing mango shake made with real mango puree and topped with whipped cream.

menu.title: Strawberry Dream Shake
menu.desc: Classic strawberry shake blended with vanilla ice cream and topped with fresh strawberry slices.

menu.title: Peanut Butter Bliss Shake
menu.desc: Creamy milkshake with rich peanut butter, chocolate chips, and a peanut brittle topping.

menu.title: Eggs Benedict
menu.desc: Poached eggs, ham, and creamy hollandaise sauce served on toasted English muffins.

menu.title: Spinach & Feta Bagel
menu.desc: Warm bagel filled with sautéed spinach, feta cheese, and sun-dried tomatoes.

menu.title: Smoked Salmon Toast
menu.desc: Open-faced toast topped with smoked salmon, cream cheese, capers, and fresh dill.

menu.title: Quinoa Power Bowl
menu.desc: A nourishing bowl with quinoa, grilled chicken, roasted veggies, avocado, and a lemon-tahini dressing.

menu.title: Halloumi & Pesto Sandwich
menu.desc: Grilled halloumi cheese, fresh tomato, arugula, and basil pesto on artisanal bread.

menu.title: Classic Caesar Salad
menu.desc: Romaine lettuce, parmesan, garlic croutons, and creamy Caesar dressing.

menu.title: Spicy Chicken Tacos
menu.desc: Three soft tacos filled with spicy grilled chicken, avocado, pico de gallo, and chipotle mayo.

menu.title: Mint Choco Shake
menu.desc: Cool mint and chocolate ice cream come together for a refreshing, indulgent shake.

menu.title: Cookies & Cream Shake
menu.desc: A rich and creamy shake blended with cookie pieces and topped with whipped cream.

menu.title: Mediterranean Shakshuka
menu.desc: Eggs poached in spicy tomato sauce with bell peppers and herbs, served with fresh bread.

menu.title: Chicken Caesar Wrap
menu.desc: Grilled chicken, romaine lettuce, parmesan, and Caesar dressing wrapped in a tortilla.

menu.title: Falafel Bowl
menu.desc: Homemade falafel, tabbouleh, hummus, and roasted veggies served over basmati rice.

menu.title: Blueberry Muffin Shake
menu.desc: A milkshake inspired by blueberry muffins, with real blueberries and vanilla ice cream.

menu.title: Tropical Breeze Shake
menu.desc: A creamy blend of pineapple, coconut, and mango for an island-inspired milkshake.
